languages.text: "Единственный способ, каким ты получишь мой Патент, — выкопаешь его из руин моего корабля".

traits.locale_text: "Единственный способ, каким ты получишь мой Патент — выкопаешь его из руин моего корабля".

languages.text: "The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."
languages.original_text: "Единственный способ, каким ты получишь мой Патент, — выкопаешь его из руин моего корабля".

traits.locale_text: "The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the ruins of my ship."
"The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the ruins of my ship."
"The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the ruins of my ship."
"The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the ruins of my ship."
"The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."
"The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."

languages.text: «La única forma de que te hagas con la Patente será extrayéndola de los restos de mi nave».
languages.original_text: "The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."

traits.locale_text: «La única forma de que te hagas con la Patente será extrayéndola de los restos de mi nave».

languages.text: 「{mf|俺|私}の令状を手に入れたいなら、船の残骸から掘りだしてみせろ」
languages.original_text: "The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."

traits.locale_text: 「{mf|俺|私}の令状を手に入れたいなら、船の残骸から掘りだしてみせろ」

languages.text: “你只有一种方法能得到我的授状，那就是从我舰船的残骸里把它给挖出来。”
languages.original_text: "The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."

traits.locale_text: “你只有一种方法能得到我的许可证，那就是从我舰船的残骸里把它给挖出来。”

languages.text: « Si vous voulez mettre la main sur ma lettre de marque, vous allez devoir l'arracher de l'épave de mon vaisseau. »
languages.original_text: "The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."

traits.locale_text: « Si vous voulez mettre la main sur ma lettre de marque, vous allez devoir l'arracher de l'épave de mon vaisseau. »

languages.text: "An meinen Handelsbrief gelangt Ihr nur, indem Ihr ihn aus den Ruinen meines Schiffs buddelt."
languages.original_text: "The only way you are going to acquire my Warrant is by digging it out of the wreckage of my ship."

traits.locale_text: "An meinen Handelsbrief gelangt Ihr nur, indem Ihr ihn aus den Ruinen meines Schiffs buddelt."
